titles.title: CARS Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals a deduction for commuting expenses.
CARS Act of 2010
Commuter Aid and Relief for Suburbs Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Commuter Aid and Relief for Suburbs Act of 2010 or the CARS Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a deduction for a specified percentage of their qualified commuting expenses. Defines "qualified commuting expenses" as reasonable expenses paid or incurred for transportation (including public transportation and associated parking fees) between an individual's residence and place of employment.
